entries.journal_entry_description: You have been asked to get involved with an investigation into a number of break-ins at cybernetic labs on Rori.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Go convince the Gundark thugs to reveal Pondas hiding place.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: According to what that last Gundark thug let slip, Ponda Baba is hiding out at a small camp nearby.
entries.task01_message_box_text: According to that last Gundark thug, Ponda Baba is hiding out at a small camp on the outskirts of Narmle.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Confront Ponda Baba and bring him in to justice.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Return to Lieutenant Tarc and let him know that Ponda Baba escaped.
